sqlMap.insert: insert into EXAMPLE_ORDER (id, userId, orderName, status, created, modified) values (#id#, #userId#, #orderName#, #status#, sysdate, sysdate)
sqlMap.select: select id, userId, orderName, status, created, modified from EXAMPLE_ORDER
select count(*) as value from EXAMPLE_ORDER

select /*+ordered use_nl(t1,t2)*/ t2.id, t2.userId, t2.orderName, t2.status, t2.created, t2.modified from (select rid from (select r.rid, rownum linenum from (select rowid rid from EXAMPLE_ORDER t
order by t.id desc) r WHERE rownum <= #endRow#) WHERE linenum >= #startRow#) t1, example t2 where t1.rid = t2.rowid

select * from (select t.*, rownum linenum from ( select id, userId, orderName, status, created, modified from EXAMPLE_ORDER t
order by t.id desc ) t WHERE rownum <= #endRow#) t WHERE linenum >= #startRow#
